lines.text: You insist? You insist? Are you trying to give me an order? Who the h__l do you think you're talking to? "You insist"!
Davis is an Army man. You've taken him into custody, arrested him for reasons unknown to us. I demand to know...
the Internal Security Forces SUPERSEDE the Army! AND DON'T YOU FORGET IT! I'll arrange your resignation so fast you won't know what hit you. "You demand".
My apology for what might have been an unfortunate choice of phrase, sir.
I render unto Caesar the things that are Caesar's.
I want to introduce you to a corpse.
